function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Economic recession highlighting risks associated with hyper-connected economic and financial systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global connectivity and trade promote the use of cheap and long-distance transportation, increasing the risk of contagious diseases spreading globally.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Restricted mobility and economic activity during the covid-19 crisis led to improved air quality but uncertain impact on climate change and biodiversity conservation.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Prioritization of economy over sustainability may lead to relaxation of conservation policies and environmental measures.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial support directed at incumbent industries with high employment may hinder the development of green energy technologies.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unsuitable use of global recovery funds could result in inadequate investment in sustainable energy development.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global reliance on fossil fuels and lack of subsidies for sustainable alternatives","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to achieve sustainable development goals sdgs by 2030","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of policies addressing the interrelation between biodiversity conservation, food security, and pandemic prevention","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic growth contributing to biodiversity loss and environmental degradation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Prioritization of gdp over human well-being and healthy environment","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of environmental health in well-being measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overemphasis on socioeconomic welfare in well-being measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with public health measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of transparent and effective governance","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in implementing adequate controlling measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to collective actions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inequality leading to social unrest","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate institutional trust","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Industrial towns experiencing unemployment due to the phase-out of polluting industries.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Resistance to bottom-up planning and cultural preferences impacting environmental adaptation.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased likelihood of contagious diseases due to individualistic societies and unsustainable consumption patterns","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Detachment of people from the biosphere leading to difficulty in caring for nature","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift in worldview from technological utopia to dependence on ecosystems","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through collaborative research and writing activities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High hiv prevalence in specific provinces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Age and marital status as predictors of hiv infection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of access to gynecologic oncologist specialists for rural women with ovarian cancer","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disparities in referral rates for rural women with ovarian cancer","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Longer time from diagnosis to surgery for rural women with ovarian cancer","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of targeted, non-coercive community interventions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete or inaccurate communication from health authorities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting mass gatherings and events without restrictions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Institutional quarantining overwhelmed system leading to more infections","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Funerals conducted in homes leading to transmission of viruses","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Timing of community mitigation measures impacting effectiveness","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19 pandemic with over 107 million infections and 2.4 million deaths worldwide.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Socio-economic and region-specific factors associated with the spread of covid-19 at an ecological level.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious diseases propagation due to group-level analysis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Influence of factors at the group level differing from individual level","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low socioeconomic status as a risk factor for contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of socio-economic factors on covid-19 transmission","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spillover effects and interlinked spread of covid-19 between neighboring regions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of dwelling size, tourism, and sectoral structure on covid-19 transmission","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Focus on clinical studies rather than socio-economic and demographic factors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited analysis of socio-economic risk factors for covid-19 in germany","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High social activity and high population density contributing to covid-19 infections","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of spatial econometric models leading to oversight of spatial spillover effects","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to consider socio-economic covariates in spatial analysis","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
